notesStmt.note: Mistakes covered over in yellow or blacked out; some corrections and additions in margins; significant syllables, words, or phrases highlighted in red throughout; vertical margins marked with double red line.

msIdentifier.repository: Kislak Center for Special Collections, Rare Books and Manuscripts

msContents.summary: Work in praise of the deity Rāma. A short hymn of praise dedicated to the monkey-god Hanumān is also written upside-down on the leaf.

msItem.title: Rāmagītā
रामगीता
msItem.colophon: Colophon: iti śrīrāmagītārāmānujasvāmīviracitaṃ saṃpurṇaṃ subham asatu śrīrāmarāmarāmarāmarāma śrīrāmakṛṣṇaśrīrāmakṛṣṇaśrīrāmakṛṣṇaśrīrāmakṛṣṇa / (f. 1v).
